posts.post_content:

Bresnahan, Portrait, Piedmont, SGC 3, $175

Keeler, Bat, Piedmont, SGC A, $125 SOLD
Bender, Tree, Piedmont, SGC 3, $175 SOLD
Tinker, Knees, Piedmont, SGC 3, $225 SOLD
